mapper.select: select * from goods order by gno
select * from goods where gtype=#{gtype } or gshape=#{gshape }
mapper.insert: insert into (gtype, gname, gshape, gcolor, gimg1 ,gimg2 ,ginfo ,price ,pieces) valuse (#{gtype }, #{gtype }, #{gshape },#{gcolor }, #{gimg1 }, #{gimg2 }, #{ginfo }, #{price }, #{pieces })
mapper.update: update goods set gtype=#{gtype },gname=#{gname },gshape=#{gshape },gcolor=#{gcolor }, gimg1=#{gimg1 }, gimg2=#{gimg2 },ginfo=#{ginfo },price=#{price },pieces=#{pieces } where gno=#{gno }
